title: Constant 190 ping?
body: Edit: My pings back to normal, everyone else should be too.

replies.body: same problem :)
Same here, playing from New Zealand.
233 ping alllllllllllllllll day

just got that problem in my ranked game, along with my bot laner, constant 175 ping...
yet more ranked games lost due to faults not my own, so sad :(
Yep, 190 ping all game, I even restarted my computer and router. only league is lagging. Everything else gets good ping. (decided to join the NA server and I got 140 ping :L) {{item:3070}}
I am at SG and using oceania server so same prob but 200ping
same issue 204 ping stable its usually 50 stable

This exactly.
It's quite obvious to me now it's Riot, as per usual.
Using alt accounts to upvote your own threads is sad.

Even if that was true it would be for good reasons like Riot seeing the thread so they can fix the issue. The more people affected the better chance they'll fix it, common sense. Also I  don't have 15 damn accounts.

Theirs no server issues, OP just has trash internet, sitting comfortably on 20 ping, never been over 50.
no its probably a routing problem since the ping is high but stable and appears to be nz users

same problem usualy 55 stable now 180

Riot makes I dont know how many million dollars.

Still, the servers have been this garbage for over 5 years.

So thanks Riot.

Too bad I cant play the game u spend ur lives developing cos out of no where I (and many others) randomly get huge lagg spikes for days on end.

Really professional. Good job.

Yeah, just played my first game for the day, constant 160 ping up from my regular 35. Was pretty hard to play on.

Edit: also from NZ which seems to be the problem

Idk how many millions u Rioters make with LoL

But what the funk.

This has been an occurring problem for years

FIX IT ITS NOT F***ING ROCKET SCIENCE
Hey guys, we can see now that players in NZ are connecting with a much better ping, so if you want to test that out it would be great :)
Fixed for me thanks.
I have to say that Riot's response to this has been quite poor, not even acknowledged after many hours of there clearly being a problem. Do they not pay attention to their own boards?
I'm sure their excuse would probably be use the Support system, which doesn't help because they'll reply with a copy and paste template depending on what your tickets based on.
Shut down the sh it server and fix it Plz

> [{quoted}](name=Poor Gogoing 1v9,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=fMF2dJs4,comment-id=0014,timestamp=2015-04-23T06:49:24.882+0000)

what about the people that aren't having ping issues? shut the server down because you can't resist playing despite having bad ping? if they can solve it without shutting the server down they should.
It seems like you do not have the problem!  All the NZ user have high ping. There should be a proper reason.
You might have something called packet loss. I did have it and still do. Contact Riot support and they can give you much more info. :D

Hey guys,

I know some of you are still experiencing ping issues. Please check out the main post stickied (link below)

>  If you are experiencing high pings please head over to http://oce.leagueoflegends.com/tools/network-logs and follow the instructions to run some diagnostics and submit the reports to us.
> 
> -ToxicHawk

http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/announcements/rLiFIegm-updatednetwork-maintenance-24042015
